title: The Wind and the river
brief_description: A documentary with a keen observation and a strong pictorial style which shows the life of the people of Kashmir, nestling among the Himalayas in the north-west of India. They are a hardworking people of individual charm who understand and appreciate the beauty of their land which in turn gives them courage and endurance. Without commentary.
